movies.name: Shawshank's Redemption
movies.description: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham. The Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines to subjugate humanity.

movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.name: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manip

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.name: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

movies.name: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.name: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.name: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: The Revenant
movies.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.name: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.name: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.name: The Martian
movies.description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assumes him dead, and he must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

movies.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

movies.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

movies.name: A Beautiful Mind
movies.description: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.name: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in

movies.name: The Prestige
movies.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.name: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.name: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.name: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.name: The Imitation Game
movies.description: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

movies.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.

movies.name: Memento
movies.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.name: The Sixth Sense
movies.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.name: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

tv-shows.name: Breaking Bad
tv-shows.creator: Vince Gilligan
tv-shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturing drug dealer teams up with a former student in the drug trade.

tv-shows.name: Game of Thrones
tv-shows.description: Nine noble families wage war against each other in the mythical lands of Westeros to gain control of the Iron Throne.

tv-shows.name: Stranger Things
tv-shows.description: In a small town where everyone knows everyone, a group of kids discovers a strange girl and a series of supernatural mysteries.

tv-shows.name: The Crown
tv-shows.creator: Peter Morgan
tv-shows.description: Follows the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and major events in British history.

tv-shows.name: Friends
tv-shows.description: Follows the lives of six friends living in New York City.
